name: Improved Steal

sections.body: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a steal combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to steal an item from a foe. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense when an opponent tries to steal an item from you.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a steal combat maneuver.
sections.name: Normal

description: You have a knack for snatching items from your opponents.
